description: Grid of favorite items with im

default.title: The Ragamuffin Gospel
default.description: Good News for the Bedraggled, Beat-Up, and Burnt Out by Brennan Manning. Just what my soul needed in these anxious times.

default.title: Between Two Kingdoms
default.description: By Suleika Jaouad. A story about major life interruptions — what happens when the life you want to return to no longer exists?

default.title: I’m Still Here
default.description: By Austin Channing Brown. A spiritual memoir about black dignity in a world made for whiteness. Everyone should read this book.

default.title: ONYX Candles
default.description: Hand-poured soy wax candles that make anyone feel (and smell) like a rich lady! Women-owned small biz with a recycling program.
